Description_lang: Pyroblast and Flamestrike's cast time is reduced by ${$s1/-1000}.1 sec and their damage dealt is increased by $s2%.

description_blz.en_US: Pyroblast and Flamestrike's cast time is reduced by 0.5 sec and their damage dealt is increased by 5%.
description_blz.es_MX: El tiempo de lanzamiento de Piroexplosión y Fogonazo se reduce 0.5 s y el daño infligido aumenta un 5%.
description_blz.pt_BR: O tempo de lançamento dos feitiços Ignimpacto e Golpe Flamejante é reduzido em 0,5 s, e o dano causado é aumentado em 5%.
description_blz.de_DE: Verringert die Zauberzeit von 'Pyroschlag' und 'Flammenstoß' um 0,5 Sek. und erhöht ihren verursachten Schaden um 5%.
description_blz.en_GB: Pyroblast and Flamestrike's cast time is reduced by 0.5 sec and their damage dealt is increased by 5%.
description_blz.es_ES: El tiempo de lanzamiento de Piroexplosión y Fogonazo se reduce 0,5 s, y el daño que inflige aumenta un 5%.
description_blz.fr_FR: Les temps de recharge d’Explosion pyrotechnique et Choc de flammes sont réduits de 0,5 s et leurs dégâts augmentés de 5 %.
description_blz.it_IT: Riduce il tempo di lancio di Pirosfera e Colonna di Fuoco di 0,5 s e ne aumenta i danni inflitti del 5%.
description_blz.ru_RU: Время применения "Огненной глыбы" и "Огненного столба" сокращается на 0,5 сек., а наносимый ими урон увеличивается на 5%.
description_blz.ko_KR: 불덩이 작렬 및 불기둥의 시전 시간이 0.5초만큼 감소하고 공격력은 5%만큼 증가합니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 炎爆術和烈焰風暴的施法時間縮短0.5秒，造成的傷害提高5%。
description_blz.zh_CN: 炎爆术和烈焰风暴的施法时间缩短0.5秒，造成的伤害提高5%。
